00020 Form::Form(WContainerWidget *parent)
00021   : WTable(parent)
00022 {
00023   createUI();

00026 void Form::addValidationStatus(int row, WFormWidget *edit)
00027 {
00028   WImage *imageInvalid = new WImage("icons/invalid.png");
00029   WImage *imageInvalidEmpty = new WImage("icons/invalid.png");
00030   elementAt(row, 1)->addWidget
00031     (new WValidationStatus(edit, 0, imageInvalid, imageInvalidEmpty));
00032 }
00033 
00034 void Form::createUI()
00035 {
00036   WLabel *label;
00037   int row = 0;
00038 
00039   // Title
00040   elementAt(row, 0)->setColumnSpan(3);
00041   elementAt(row, 0)->setContentAlignment(AlignTop | AlignCenter);
00042   elementAt(row, 0)->setPadding(10);
00043   WText *title = new WText(tr("example.form"),
00044                            elementAt(row, 0));
00045   title->decorationStyle().font().setSize(WFont::XLarge);
00046 
00047   // error messages
00048   ++row;
00049   elementAt(row, 0)->setColumnSpan(3);
00050   feedbackMessages_ = elementAt(row, 0);
00051   feedbackMessages_->setPadding(5);
00052 
00053   WCssDecorationStyle& errorStyle = feedbackMessages_->decorationStyle();
00054   errorStyle.setForegroundColor(Wt::red);
00055   errorStyle.font().setSize(WFont::Smaller);
00056   errorStyle.font().setWeight(WFont::Bold);
00057   errorStyle.font().setStyle(WFont::Italic);
00058 
00059   // Name
00060   ++row;
00061   nameEdit_ = new WLineEdit(elementAt(row, 2));
00062   label = new WLabel(tr("example.name"), elementAt(row, 0));
00063   label->setBuddy(nameEdit_);
00064   nameEdit_->setValidator(new WValidator(true));
00065   nameEdit_->enterPressed.connect(SLOT(this, Form::submit));
00066   addValidationStatus(row, nameEdit_);
00067 
00068   // First name
00069   ++row;
00070   firstNameEdit_ = new WLineEdit(elementAt(row, 2));
00071   label = new WLabel(tr("example.firstname"), elementAt(row,0));
00072   label->setBuddy(firstNameEdit_);
00073 
00074   // Country
00075   ++row;
00076   countryEdit_ = new WComboBox(elementAt(row, 2));
00077   countryEdit_->addItem(L"");
00078   countryEdit_->addItem(L"Belgium");
00079   countryEdit_->addItem(L"Netherlands");
00080   countryEdit_->addItem(L"United Kingdom");
00081   countryEdit_->addItem(L"United States");
00082   label = new WLabel(tr("example.country"), elementAt(row, 0));
00083   label->setBuddy(countryEdit_);
00084   countryEdit_->setValidator(new WValidator(true));
00085   addValidationStatus(row, countryEdit_);
00086   countryEdit_->changed.connect(SLOT(this, Form::countryChanged));
00087 
00088   // City
00089   ++row;
00090   cityEdit_ = new WComboBox(elementAt(row, 2));
00091   cityEdit_->addItem(tr("example.choosecountry"));
00092   label = new WLabel(tr("example.city"), elementAt(row, 0));
00093   label->setBuddy(cityEdit_);
00094 
00095   // Birth date
00096   ++row;
00097   birthDateEdit_ = new WLineEdit(elementAt(row, 2));
00098   label = new WLabel(tr("example.birthdate"), elementAt(row, 0));
00099   label->setBuddy(birthDateEdit_);
00100   birthDateEdit_->setValidator(new DateValidator(date(1900,Jan,1),
00101                                                  day_clock::local_day()));
00102   birthDateEdit_->validator()->setMandatory(true);
00103   addValidationStatus(row, birthDateEdit_);
00104 
00105   // Child count
00106   ++row;
00107   childCountEdit_ = new WLineEdit(L"0", elementAt(row, 2));
00108   label = new WLabel(tr("example.childcount"),
00109                      elementAt(row, 0));
00110   label->setBuddy(childCountEdit_);
00111   childCountEdit_->setValidator(new WIntValidator(0,30));
00112   childCountEdit_->validator()->setMandatory(true);
00113   addValidationStatus(row, childCountEdit_);
00114 
00115   ++row;
00116   remarksEdit_ = new WTextArea(elementAt(row, 2));
00117   remarksEdit_->setColumns(40);
00118   remarksEdit_->setRows(5);
00119   label = new WLabel(tr("example.remarks"),
00120                      elementAt(row, 0));
00121   label->setBuddy(remarksEdit_);
00122 
00123   // Submit
00124   ++row;
00125   WPushButton *submit = new WPushButton(tr("submit"),
00126                                         elementAt(row, 0));
00127   submit->clicked.connect(SLOT(this, Form::submit));
00128   submit->setMargin(15, Top);
00129   elementAt(row, 0)->setColumnSpan(3);
00130   elementAt(row, 0)->setContentAlignment(AlignTop | AlignCenter);
00131 
00132   // Set column widths for label and validation icon
00133   elementAt(2, 0)->resize(WLength(30, WLength::FontEx), WLength());
00134   elementAt(2, 1)->resize(WLength(20), WLength());
00135 }

00137 void Form::countryChanged()
00138 {
00139   cityEdit_->clear();
00140   cityEdit_->addItem(L"");
00141   cityEdit_->setCurrentIndex(0);
00142 
00143   switch (countryEdit_->currentIndex()) {
00144   case 0:
00145     break;
00146   case 1:
00147     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Antwerp");
00148     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Brussels");
00149     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Oekene");
00150     break;
00151   case 2:
00152     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Amsterdam");
00153     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Den Haag");
00154     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Rotterdam");
00155     break;
00156   case 3:
00157     cityEdit_->addItem(L"London");
00158     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Bristol");
00159     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Oxford");
00160     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Stonehenge");
00161     break;
00162   case 4:
00163     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Boston");
00164     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Chicago");
00165     cityEdit_->addItem(L"Los Angelos");
00166     cityEdit_->addItem(L"New York");
00167     break;
00168   }    
00169 }
00170 
00171 bool Form::checkValid(WFormWidget *edit, const WMessage& text)
00172 {
00173   if (edit->validate() != WValidator::Valid) {
00174     feedbackMessages_->addWidget(new WText(text));
00175     feedbackMessages_->addWidget(new WBreak());
00176     edit->label()->decorationStyle().setForegroundColor(Wt::red);
00177 
00178     return false;
00179   } else {
00180     edit->label()->decorationStyle().setForegroundColor(WColor());    
00181 
00182     return true;
00183   }
00184 }
00185 
00186 bool Form::validate()
00187 {
00188   feedbackMessages_->clear();
00189   bool valid = true;
00190 
00191   if (!checkValid(nameEdit_, tr("error.name")))
00192     valid = false;
00193   if (!checkValid(countryEdit_, tr("error.country")))
00194     valid = false;
00195   if (!checkValid(birthDateEdit_, tr("error.birthdate")))
00196     valid = false;
00197   if (!checkValid(childCountEdit_, tr("error.childcount")))
00198     valid = false;
00199 
00200   return valid;
00201 }
00202 
00203 void Form::submit()
00204 {
00205   if (validate()) {
00206     // do something useful with the data...
00207     std::wstring name
00208       = firstNameEdit_->text() + L" " + nameEdit_->text();
00209 
00210     std::wstring remarks
00211       = remarksEdit_->text();
00212 
00213     clear();
00214 
00215     // WMessage with arguments is not yet implemented...
00216     new WText(L"<p>Thank you, "
00217               + name
00218               + L", for all this precious data.</p>", elementAt(0, 0));
00219     
00220     if (!remarks.empty())
00221       new WText(L"<p>You had some remarks. Splendid !</p>", elementAt(0, 0));
00222 
00223     wApp->quit();
00224   }
00225 }
